entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
